description: Spiritual in East Wenatchee, WA. Kolar Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in East Wenatchee serving all of your needs. Call us today at (509) 884-4200 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
